ingredients.content: 2 oz Parmesan cheese, cut into pieces
21 oz ripe tomatoes, cut into pieces (¾ in.)
1 ½ tsp salt, or to taste
½ tsp ground black pepper, or to taste
16 oz eggplant, cut into pieces (¾ in.)
12 ½ oz dried pasta, eg. farfalle (bow tie pasta) or amori
3 sprigs fresh basil leaves (approx. 20 medium leaves)

preparations.content: Place Parmesan into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place oil, garlic and onions into mixing bowl and chop <b>4 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and sauté <b>4 min/250°F/speed 1<b>.
Add tomatoes, salt, pepper and sugar and cook <b>10 min/230°F/speed 1<b> .
Add eggplant and cook a further <b>20 min/230°F/speed 1<b> .
Add pasta and water, mix with aid of spatula, and cook for <b>time indicated on package/212°F//speed 1<b>. Check if pasta is cooked. If not, continue to cook a further <b>2 min/212°F//speed 1<b>.
Stir in fresh basil leaves and sprinkle with reserved grated Parmesan. Serve immediately.
